attributes.action: Share UK vaccines with helpless people hit by India's Covid crisis.
attributes.additional_details:
We work closely with our colleagues in India. We have daily contact & hear first hand just how out of control this situation really is.  The way in which the latest strain of Covid-19 is affecting India is horrific and the people there need urgent aid to support every aspect of their lives.

Allowing the virus to circulate, could cause dangerous new strains & prolong the pandemic. The likely impact of this locally AND globally is unfathomable.
attributes.background: We are launching this petition to ask the UK Government to help... to do what's right! We want plans to be put in place to share our vaccines with India's crisis areas to help contain the virus.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Increase support for India in the Covid Crisis: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/584152

Once priority groups in the UK are vaccinated redirect Covid-19 vaccines abroad: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/572802

Send excess equipment to countries in humanitarian covid crisis: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/584188
